# The `TargetExtType` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Class to represent target extensions types, which are generally unintrospectable from target-independent optimizations. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::TargetExtType</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Class to represent target extensions types, which are generally unintrospectable from target-independent optimizations.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a> extension types have a string name, and optionally have type and/or integer parameters. The exact meaning of any parameters is dependent on the target.

Definition at line 744 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/derivedtypes-h">DerivedTypes.h</a>.

## Enumerations

### enum  {#aceab85623e5be346f2c3b6cfd456a151}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="enum llvm::TargetExtType::Property ">

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="aceab85623e5be346f2c3b6cfd456a151a1d37e04976c5b79594e646502e66f818" />
<EnumerationListItem name="HasZeroInit">
zeroinitializer is valid for this target extension type (= 1U &lt;&lt; 0)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="aceab85623e5be346f2c3b6cfd456a151abf26885999e35b6a439eb474140eb8df" />
<EnumerationListItem name="CanBeGlobal">
This type may be used as the value type of a global variable (= 1U &lt;&lt; 1)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="aceab85623e5be346f2c3b6cfd456a151acf4f0ccb291a1b0811d54014de155c45" />
<EnumerationListItem name="CanBeLocal">
This type may be allocated on the stack, either as the allocated type of an alloca instruction or as a byval function parameter (= 1U &lt;&lt; 2)
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

### getLayoutType() {#ae473a097292848f10f82f0961245e012}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Type &#42; TargetExtType::getLayoutType () const</>}>
Returns an underlying layout type for the target extension type.

This type can be used to query size and alignment information, if it is appropriate (although note that the layout type may also be void). It is not legal to bitcast between this type and the layout type, however.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/derivedtypes-h/#l00821">821</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/derivedtypes-h">DerivedTypes.h</a>, definition at line 1010 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/type-cpp">Type.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getName() {#ad8c601299924b31a49f7a419faea70d4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="StringRef llvm::TargetExtType::getName () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return the name for this target extension type.

Two distinct target extension types may have the same name if their type or integer parameters differ.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/derivedtypes-h/#l00778">778</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/derivedtypes-h">DerivedTypes.h</a>.
